# HMCameraStreamState.streaming

**Case**

The state when the camera stream is currently in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
case streaming
```

## Observing the streaming state

- **HMCameraStreamState.notStreaming**: The state when the camera stream is not active.
- **HMCameraStreamState.starting**: The state when the camera stream start request is processing.
- **HMCameraStreamState.stopping**: The state when the camera stream is stopping.
